original_text: But the woman did become pregnant. At that time next year she gave birth to a son. Elisha had said that this would happen.
korean_text: 여인이 과연 잉태하여 한 해가 지나 이 때쯤에 엘리사가 여인에게 말한 대로 아들을 낳았더라

sentences.original_text: But the woman did become pregnant

sentences.korean_translation: 바로 그 다음 해 그 시간에

sentences.original_text: she gave birth to a son
